pageProduct.name: Oz Guard SPF 50+ Toy Story 4 75ml Roll On
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Broad Protection roll-on sunscreen lotion for protection against UV exposure.Broad Protection roll-on sunscreen lotion for protection against UV exposure.

Warnings

Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun. Always wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear when exposed to the sun. Avoid contact with eyes. Avoid contact with fabrics. If irritation develops, discontinue use.
Contains phenoxyethanol.

Common Uses

Broad Protection sunscreen lotion for protection against UV exposure.

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTSHomosalate 100 mg/g, Octyl Salicylate 50 mg/g, Octocrylene40 mg/g, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 35 mg/g,Ethylhexyl Triazone 6 mg/g, Bemotrizinol 4 mg/g.
